title: There is No Such Thing as a Bad Hunter - Novel Updates
tags: Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   Doting Love Interests   Dungeons   First Love   Guilds   Hunters   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Power Couple   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger
author: Seram   세람
description:
The “first awakened one” recognized by everyone… is only a B-rank.
Jiho, who fought hard despite everyone’s mockery, had unluckily gotten caught up in a S-rank dungeon and was about to die when…

A special chance is presented to him.
He gains the skills to check others’ abilities with the system and strengthen them.

‘Is this… a hallucination? Is this a monster’s trick?’
[Why are you so surprised? ヽ(‘ ∇‘ )ノIt’s my skill. Aren’t I impressive?  ( ⁎ ᵕᴗᵕ ⁎ )]

With this skill, Jiho can prove himself.
He doesn’t have to rely on someone anymore.

Jiho finally begins to spread his wings.
However, his childhood friend and SS-rank hunter Yiwon tries to stop Jiho from becoming a hunter…

“Stop being a hunter now. It’s not like you have to worry about making a living.”
“Why do you talk like that, a**hole?”

The slowly approaching danger… and the confusing Yiwon.
Will Jiho be able to solve everything and succeed?>
